body:
Hi all,

I have attached one of my file of chris's example where I tried for energy plus simulation but its not working. I am not finding any reason. Can anybody please help me figure it out.

attachments.name: 6 - Running a Basic Energy Simulation by krk.gh

topic: Energy plus simulation is not working.No idf file,no result file,no update of ladybug and honeybee objects

replies.body:
Hi,

Is your problem similar to [mine](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/runenergysimulation-error-hb-epzonesurface-object-has-no)? If yes, just stick around, from personal experience posts with more information and images tend to get response faster.
yes may be. but I solved mine. I put my rhino geometry in Meter.
Then I think we have different problems, I was working in meters from the start.
